title: Medical App
subtitle: Ui Design
greetingText: MedApp allows doctors to connect with a network of hospitals to perform procedures.
detailsText:
MedApp wants to rebuild the way medical procedures works right now, allowing connect operating room with different doctors. 
It is a scheduling system for doctors where they contact to request a proctor for specialized surgeries.
contributionList: Mockup design: provide the Invision prototype and Sketch files
